original: I wish things could have been different.
translated: J'aurais aimé que les choses se passent différemment.

original: That's how I lost my job.

original: May the queen live long!

original: Who was here this morning?

original: I've worked all night.

original: Give me a bell as soon as you arrive.

original: You're fluent in French, right?

original: We're enthusiastic.

original: The two brothers died.

original: Hail a cab.

original: Asshole!

original: Tom likes bureaucracy very much.

original: Feed the bird.

original: I haven't asked you a question yet.

original: Whoever guesses the number wins.

original: Drop it!

original: I don't think I can help you.

original: I'm used to doing that in the dark.

original: My sister has ginger hair.

original: People have no money.

original: She walked in the woods.

original: Add the flour and baking powder, then the butter and leftover milk; let stand for 15 min.
translated: Ajouter la farine et la levure chimique, puis le beurre et le restant du lait. Laisser reposer 15 min.

original: The opinion reunites or divides men.
translated: L'opinion réunit ou divise les hommes.

original: We're quite tired.

original: A square has four sides.
translated: Un carré a quatre côtés.

original: Gotcha.

translated: Elle n'aime pas parler en public.

original: She's insecure.

original: I think it's time for me to get my own place.

original: Use them all.

original: How good are you?

original: He was better than I expected.

original: It's acceptable.

original: The moon is out.

original: We all have our off days.

original: You had better see the doctor.

original: It is hard to convince John.

original: Saying you can't do the job because you're too busy is just a cop out.
translated: Dire que vous ne pouvez pas faire le travail parce que vous êtes trop occupé est une excuse bidon.

original: My father lives in the country.
translated: Mon père vit à la campagne.

original: Sami was working at an insurance company.
translated: Sami travaillait pour une compagnie d'assurance.

original: If you cut me in for 20 percent, I will keep your secret safe.
translated: Si vous me donnez vingt pour cent, je garderai votre secret.

original: Exercise is good for your health.
translated: Faire des exercices est bon pour la santé.

original: He's shivering because of the cold.

original: That's an Arabic name.

original: The chromosomes in our cells contain the whole of our genetic material.
translated: Les chromosomes de nos cellules contiennent l'ensemble de notre matériel génétique.

original: They're here for me.
translated: Ils sont là pour moi.

original: Dan touted his racist ideas to his friends.

original: It's not a matter of price.

original: Don't ever ask me to do that again.

original: It's freezing in here.

original: You're welcome to come with us if you want to.

original: Tom knows where we live.

original: I went to the wrong address.
translated: Je me suis trompé d'adresse.

original: This sentence has no owner. You may adopt and change it, provided it will still match its direct translations, in which case you should warn the translators of your changes by commenting on their translations.
translated: Cette phrase n'a pas de possesseur. Vous pouvez l'adopter et la changer, pourvu qu'elle corresponde toujours aux autres traductions directes, auquel cas vous devriez prévenir les traducteurs de vos changements, en commentant leurs traductions.

original: She made my life miserable.
translated: Elle m'a pourri la vie.

original: I've just bought a new pair of shoes.
translated: Je viens d'acheter une nouvelle paire de chaussures.

original: Dan was romantically interested in Linda.
translated: Dan a de l'attirance pour Linda.

original: I got nervous.
translated: Je devenais nerveuse.

original: You've been selected.
translated: Vous avez été sélectionnés.

original: His spirit failed.
translated: Son esprit lui a fait défaut.

original: This is bad for business.
translated: C'est mauvais pour les affaires.

original: This house is said to be haunted.

original: God forbid!

original: You're the only person I can trust.

original: Mennad turned on the Christmas tree.

original: I must get a new suit made.

original: You're too slow.

original: Where did you go fishing?

original: I have the opposite opinion.

original: I'm starting at noon.
translated: Je commence à midi.

original: Tom is safe.
translated: Tom est en sécurité.

original: Does he have many books?

original: Mary said she was tired of losing.
translated: Marie a dit qu'elle en avait assez de perdre.

original: We'll make our announcement on Thursday.
translated: Nous ferons notre annonce jeudi.

original: The contest ends tomorrow.

original: He saw there what he had dreamed about.

original: I'm Italian.
translated: Je suis Italien.

original: Is there anyone in the room?

translated: Son anglais va s'améliorer au fil du temps.

original: You're wealthy, aren't you?

original: I don't know why he quit the company.

original: Hopefully, being ridiculous doesn't kill you !

original: The man you met at the station is my father.

original: Tom refused to help me.
translated: Tom a refusé de m'aider.

original: Fortunately, the weather was good.

original: Are we doing this?

original: Hang on a bit until I'm ready.

original: We had a difficult winter.

original: I don't find that helpful.

original: The drink is on me.

original: I think you'd be interested in this.

original: Every step was difficult for him.

original: I'm eight years old.

original: Get ready quickly.

original: Tom is my boss at work.

original: I thought Tom would leave the book with Mary.

original: It's bulky.

original: That's right.

original: They're jealous of my noodles.

original: I can't wait to hug you.

original: I was so disappointed.

original: She's probably wrong.

original: The very pure spirit does not bother about the regard of others or human respect, but communes inwardly with God, alone and in solitude as to all forms, and with delightful tranquility, for the knowledge of God is received in divine silence.
translated: Un esprit vraiment pur ne se préoccupe pas de la considération ni du respect des autres, mais communie intérieurement avec Dieu, dans la solitude sous toutes ses formes et avec une heureuse sérénité, car la connaissance de Dieu se reçoit dans un silence divin.

original: Do you recognize the man in this photo?

original: We'll be careful.

original: Is it possible to reserve a room at your hotel?

original: I am swamped with work.

original: May I?

original: Natural selection explains "only the survival of the fittest, not the arrival of the fittest".
translated: La sélection naturelle explique « seulement la survie du plus apte, pas l'apparition du plus apte ».

original: I still have to do that.
translated: Je dois toujours faire ça.

original: He cannot be a poet.

original: If I'd wanted your opinion, I would've asked for it.
translated: Si j'avais voulu ton opinion, je te l'aurais demandée.

original: Tom is scared of something.

original: What time do you have on your watch?

original: I can't hide forever.
translated: Je ne peux pas me cacher pour toujours.

original: Sami worked there for about six years.
translated: Sami y a travaillé pendant environ six ans.

original: It's terrible.

original: He traveled to France to brush up his colloquial French.
translated: Il est allé en France pour rafraîchir son français parlé.

original: Take a few steps and tell me if it hurts when you walk.
translated: Fais quelques pas et ensuite dis-moi si ça te fait mal quand tu marches.

original: There seem to be lots and lots of stars.
translated: Il semble y avoir des myriades d'étoiles.

original: How do you like your new school?

original: Why should you suspect me?
translated: Pourquoi devrais-tu me suspecter ?

original: What do they look like?

original: Tom watched suspiciously.

original: I'm not giving you any money.

original: There may be some truth in your story.

original: Tom's uncle can only comprehend a quarter of a tenth of all these mysteries.
translated: L'oncle de Tom ne comprenait que le quart du dixième de tous ces mystères.

original: The tree in front of the library was struck by lightning.
translated: L'arbre devant la bibliothèque a était frappé par la foudre.

original: It's just a short walk to the beach.
translated: La plage est à deux pas.

original: Romantic, isn't it?

original: I'm working on a new song.
translated: Je travaille sur une nouvelle chanson.

original: The iPhone is an extraordinary cell phone.
translated: L'iPhone est un téléphone portable extraordinaire.

original: I've tried to explain it to Tom.
translated: J'ai essayé de l'expliquer à Tom.

original: You can't sit there.
translated: Vous ne pouvez pas vous asseoir là.

original: The ship lowered its gangway after docking.
translated: Le navire abaissa sa passerelle après s'être mis à quai.

original: I don't see her anymore.
translated: Je ne la vois plus.

original: This is what'll happen.

original: I will never forget seeing you.
translated: Je n'oublierai jamais t'avoir vu.

original: Do you have the time?

original: I'm not a saint.
translated: Je ne suis pas un saint.

original: We have a little time before the next train.
translated: Nous avons un peu de temps avant le prochain train.

original: The storm stopped the train.
translated: La tempête a fait arrêter le train.

original: I usually sleep in a bed.
translated: D'habitude, je dors dans un lit.

original: I was very tired today.
translated: J'étais très fatiguée aujourd'hui.

original: Put the pliers in the tool box.
translated: Mets la pince dans la boîte à outils.

original: I'd love to get rid of this old car.
translated: J'adorerais me débarrasser de cette vieille chignole.

original: This is the little we know.
translated: C'est le peu que nous savons.

original: It's too spicy.
translated: C'est trop épicé.

original: Does she drink coffee?
translated: Boit-elle du café ?

original: Have you called him yet?
translated: L'avez-vous déjà appelé ?

original: I didn't mean it.
translated: Ce n'était pas mon intention.

original: Tom was my first real boyfriend.
translated: Tom fut mon premier vrai petit ami.

original: It was almost noon when you woke up.
translated: Il était presque midi lorsque tu t'es réveillé.

original: There were no knives.
translated: Il n'y avait pas de couteaux.

original: The principal shook hands with each of the graduating pupils.
translated: Le chef d'établissement serra la main à chacun des élèves reçus.

original: I have thalassaemia.
translated: J’ai la thalassémie.

original: Leave!
translated: Dégage !

original: Destroy the castle.
translated: Détruisez le château.

original: Jim was caught cheating in the examination.
translated: Jim a été attrapé alors qu'il trichait à l'examen.

original: Call me before you leave.
translated: Appelez-moi avant de partir.

original: Have you met anyone yet?
translated: Avez-vous déjà rencontré qui que ce soit ?

original: Why did you decide to get divorced?
translated: Pourquoi avez-vous décidé de divorcer ?

original: You were totally out of line.
translated: Tu as complètement dépassé les bornes.

original: They were all hoarse from shouting.
translated: Ils avaient tous la voix rauque après avoir tant crié.

original: Eat a lot!
translated: Mangez beaucoup !

original: I have a few gray hairs already.
translated: J'ai déjà quelques cheveux gris.

original: They're lazy.
translated: Elles sont paresseuses.

original: Don't call him names.
translated: Ne l'insultez pas.

original: I dare say he is innocent.
translated: J'ose dire qu'il est innocent.

original: I can't stand being disturbed in my work.
translated: Je ne peux pas supporter d'être dérangé pendant mon travail.

original: I can't figure out how to get the window open.
translated: Je n'arrive pas à comprendre comment ouvrir la fenêtre.

original: They have many friends.
translated: Ils ont beaucoup d'amies.

original: The American Civil War is the central theme of the book.
translated: La guerre de Sécession est le thème central de ce livre.

original: Now go have fun.
translated: Maintenant, allez vous amuser.

original: Your cheeks are flushed.
translated: Tu as les joues rouges.

original: Tom and Mary are planning a picnic at the lake.
translated: Tom et Mary préparent un pic-nique au bord du lac.

original: You're shy, aren't you?
translated: Tu es timide, n'est-ce pas ?

original: It's easier said than done.
translated: Plus facile à dire qu'à faire.

original: Yanni helped.
translated: Yanni a aidé.

original: They planted apple trees.
translated: Ils ont planté des pommiers.

original: I'm not like the other guys. I'm the best and I always say the truth.
translated: Je ne suis pas comme les autres. Je suis le meilleur et je dis toujours la vérité.

original: Nothing is more pleasant than to take a walk on a fine spring day.
translated: Rien n'est plus agréable que de se promener par un beau jour de printemps.

original: I asked him to drive me home.
translated: Je lui ai demandé de me ramener chez moi en voiture.

original: Containment weighs us down.
translated: Le confinement nous pése.

original: We don't share the same values.

original: Have I any letters or messages?

original: I don't understand a word of what he says.
translated: Je ne comprends pas un mot de ce qu'il dit.

original: Tom's thinking of moving so he'll be closer to Mary.
translated: Tom pense à déménager pour se rapprocher de Marie.

original: I slept on the sofa.
translated: J'ai dormi sur le canapé.

original: I'm going to need someone to help me.
translated: Je vais avoir besoin de quelqu'un pour m'aider.

original: I can explain it all.

original: Nothing is more precious than time.
translated: Rien n'est plus précieux que le temps.

original: He didn't even hear him.
translated: Il ne l'a même pas entendu.

original: I don't like this brand of ketchup.
translated: Je n'aime pas cette marque de ketchup.

original: Let's suppose you happen to strike it rich at the races.
translated: Supposons que tu deviennes très riche en jouant aux courses.

original: Am I wrong?

original: Why was money invented?

original: You must work hard to succeed.
translated: Tu dois travailler dur pour réussir.

original: I hurried in order to catch the first train.
translated: Je me suis dépêché pour prendre le premier train.

original: There is a full moon tonight.

original: Maybe we can make a deal.

original: Your shoes are here.
translated: Tes chaussures sont ici.

original: You'll find a job.
translated: Tu trouveras du travail.

original: Can Tom speak French?
translated: Tom parle-t-il français ?

original: I was asleep.
translated: J'étais endormie.

original: Can I try on this jumper, please?
translated: Est-ce que je peux essayer ce pull, s'il vous plaît ?

original: Remain seated, please.
translated: Reste assise, je te prie.

original: I can't believe I really did that.
translated: Je ne peux pas croire que j'ai vraiment fait ça.

original: How wonderful!
translated: Merveilleux !

original: The Aegis collision - why couldn't it have been avoided?
translated: Collision avec le navire Aegis : pourquoi n'a-t-on pas pu l'éviter ?

original: You're reading.

original: We should have set off earlier.

original: Be on your guard against pickpockets.

original: I have stomach ache.

original: FSI officer: "Sir, there is a website where ANYONE can add a sentence in a foreign language!". FSI president: "What?! Bomb them!".
translated: Employé FSI : « Chef, il y a un site internet où N'IMPORTE QUI peut ajouter une phrase dans une langue étrangère ! » Le président du FSI : « Comment ?! Bombardez-les ! »

translated: Le rêve d'opportunité pour tous ne s'est pas réalisé pour chacun en Amérique, mais sa promesse existe pour tous ceux qui touchent nos côtes - ceci comprend presque sept millions de Musulmans Étasuniens dans notre pays aujourd'hui, qui jouissent de revenus et d'éducation qui sont supérieures à la moyenne.

translated: Parlez à vos pièces, demandez-leur où ils aimeraient aller, s'ils aimeraient quitter l'échiquier ou même se sacrifier pour le plus grand bien.

translated: La boulangerie est au coin de la rue.

original: I really don't have anything else to say.
translated: Je n'ai vraiment pas quoi que ce soit à ajouter.

original: Friends help each other. Just let me know what's wrong.
translated: Les amis doivent s'entraider. Dis-moi ce qui ne va pas.

original: Call me.
translated: Appelez-moi !

original: It's fun to travel.
translated: Voyager, c'est amusant.

original: I realized I couldn't win.
translated: J'ai pris conscience que je ne pouvais gagner.

original: Why do mosquito bites itch?
translated: Pourquoi les piqûres de moustiques provoquent-elles des démangeaisons ?

original: My father used to read me bedtime stories.
translated: Mon père avait l'habitude de me lire des histoires pour dormir.

original: You should have done a language study abroad.
translated: Vous devriez avoir fait un séjour linguistique à l'étranger.

original: My team has won many medals.
translated: Mon équipe avait gagné plusieurs médailles.

original: I'm circumcised.
translated: Je suis circoncis.

original: I'm very sorry about what the U.S. has done in Iraq. This war has been a tragedy for everyone.
translated: Je suis vraiment désolé pour ce que les Etats-Unis ont fait en Iraq. Cette guerre a été une tragédie pour tout le monde.

original: That bicycle over there is my brother's.
translated: Le vélo qui est là est à mon frère.

original: We're leaving in five minutes.
translated: On part dans cinq minutes.

original: I was in pretty bad shape.
translated: J'étais dans un assez sale état.

original: What are you doing in my office?
translated: Que faites-vous dans mon bureau ?

original: I can't believe you actually did that.
translated: Je n'arrive pas à croire que tu aies vraiment fait cela.

original: Tom never really trusted Mary.
translated: Tom n'a jamais vraiment fait confiance à Mary.

original: We work daily.
translated: Nous travaillons quotidiennement.

original: I am thankful for the food I eat.
translated: Merci pour le repas, je vous en suis reconnaissant.

original: I was completely shocked.
translated: J'étais totalement choqué.

original: We're very different, you and I.
translated: Nous sommes très différents, toi et moi.

original: Who sings this song?
translated: Qui chante cette chanson ?

original: Are you Chamorro?
translated: Es-tu Chamorro ?

original: Which one do you think is correct?
translated: Lequel est correct à ton avis ?

original: I don't care where you're eating dinner.
translated: Je me fiche de savoir où vous dînez.

original: Welcome to our city!
translated: Bienvenue dans notre ville !

original: Oh God, help me!
translated: Oh, mon Dieu, viens-moi en aide !

original: They're probably Americans.
translated: Elles sont probablement étasuniennes.

original: Music is her passion.
translated: La musique est sa passion.

original: There are no people on the moon.
translated: Il n'y a personne sur la lune.

original: Nobody told us anything.
translated: Personne ne nous a rien dit.

original: You are very fortunate that you have such friends.
translated: Tu as beaucoup de chance d'avoir de tels amis.

original: You should've seen the movie.
translated: Tu aurais dû voir le film.

original: The soldiers' mission was to destroy the bridge.
translated: La mission des soldats était de détruire le pont.

original: This doesn't involve you.
translated: Ça ne te concerne pas.

original: I know Tom doesn't love you.
translated: Je sais que Tom ne t'aime pas.

original: Some of the students went by bus, and others on foot.
translated: Certains des étudiants sont venus en bus, et d'autres à pied.

original: What gift would you like for Christmas?
translated: Qu'aimeriez-vous comme cadeau de Noël ?

original: He is Canadian.
translated: Il est canadien.

original: You are really adorable.
translated: Tu es vraiment adorable.

original: He came to the party last night with Jane.
translated: Il est venu à la fête hier soir avec Jane.

original: Are you sure? Why not?
translated: Êtes-vous sûre ? Pourquoi pas ?

original: Give Sami a ride to the bus stop.
translated: Ramène Sami à l'arrêt de bus.

original: Lincoln was a Republican.
translated: Lincoln était Républicain.

original: It's time to establish the religion of love.
translated: Il est temps d'instaurer la religion de l'amour.

original: Reason can object as much as it wants to, but imagination has created a second nature in mankind.
translated: La raison a beau crier, l'imagination a établi dans l'homme une seconde nature.

original: Don't get your new pants dirty.
translated: Ne salissez pas votre nouveau pantalon.

original: I prefer to do it alone.
translated: Je préfère le faire seul.

original: Your friends will regret your absence.
translated: Vos amis regretteront votre absence.

original: What do you like to eat for lunch?
translated: Qu'aimes-tu manger au déjeuner ?

original: You're a beautiful woman.
translated: Tu es une belle femme.

original: Sorry!
translated: Désolé.

original: You will fix it, won't you?
translated: Vous le réparerez, non ?

original: Don't deceive him.
translated: Ne le trompe pas.

original: The opening ceremony took place on schedule.
translated: La cérémonie d'inauguration s'est déroulée selon l'horaire.

original: You've failed.
translated: Vous avez échoué.

original: How much time do we have to finish this?
translated: Combien de temps avons-nous pour finir cela ?

original: Are you gay?
translated: Es-tu homo ?

original: I think we should try it.
translated: Je pense que nous devrions essayer.

original: Look, I don't want to lose my job.
translated: Écoute, je ne veux pas perdre mon poste.

original: Ziri owns himself.
translated: Ziri se possède lui-même.

original: I should've married your sister instead of you.
translated: J'aurais dû épouser ta sœur, au lieu de toi.

original: Tell me what I have to do.
translated: Dis-moi ce que j'ai à faire.

original: Enzymes are responsible for digestion, respiration, photosynthesis, and metabolism. They are responsible for forming all of us and keeping us alive. They are the engines of life.
translated: Les enzymes sont responsables de la digestion, de la respiration, de la photosynthèse et du métabolisme. Elles sont chargées de la formation de chacun d'entre nous et nous maintiennent en vie. Elles sont les moteurs de la vie.

original: Hand washing is recommended to prevent the spread of contagious diseases like a coronavirus.
translated: Le lavage des mains est recommandé pour prévenir la propagation de maladies contagieuses comme un coronavirus.

original: I was just about to go out when it began to rain hard.
translated: J'étais sur le point de partir lorsqu'il se mit à pleuvoir fort.

original: That reporter has a nose for news.
translated: Ce journaliste a du flair pour les nouvelles.

original: She buys the shirts she wants to wear.
translated: Elle achète les chemises qu'elle veut porter.

original: The parents named their baby Akira.
translated: Les parents ont appelé leur bébé Akira.

original: The sound became fainter and fainter, till at last it disappeared.
translated: Le son devenait de plus en plus faible, jusqu'à ce qu'il disparaisse.

original: Thank you for helping me find a good job.
translated: Merci de m'aider à trouver un bon boulot.

original: One should not make fun of others.
translated: Il ne faut pas se moquer des autres.

original: Have you gotten used to eating Japanese food yet?
translated: T'es-tu enfin accoutumé à consommer de la nourriture japonaise ?

original: I crouched behind the bush.
translated: Je me suis tapi derrière le buisson.

original: Do like I tell you.
translated: Fais comme je te dis.

original: I'll explain it all later.
translated: J'expliquerai tout plus tard.

original: Listen to this podcast.
translated: Écoutez ce podcast.

original: Don't expect to find philosophy in the poems of a twenty-year-old.
translated: Il ne faut pas chercher de philosophie dans les poésies d'un jeune homme de vingt ans.

original: You're all done.
translated: Vous êtes tous finis.

original: I think we need to postpone the meeting.
translated: Je pense qu'il nous faut décaler la réunion.

original: I'm not selfish.
translated: Je ne suis pas égoïste.

original: I have to take a leak.
translated: Il faut que je pisse.

original: There is no water in the well.
translated: Il n'y a pas d'eau dans le puits.

original: Yesterday I had my bicycle stolen.
translated: On m'a volé mon vélo hier.

original: The official languages of the UN are Arabic, Chinese, English, French, Russian, and Spanish.
translated: Les langues officielles de l’ONU sont l’arabe, le chinois, l’anglais, le français, le russe et l’espagnol.

original: You want me to wash my hands first, don't you?
translated: Tu veux que je me lave d'abord les mains, n'est-ce pas ?

original: Will you send someone to fix it as soon as possible?
translated: Peux-tu envoyer quelqu'un pour la réparer le plus tôt possible ?
